summary.span: 为 提供像素格式转换功能。

span.span: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，以优化多个属性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 属性更改只能在对象初始化过程中发生。Property changes can occur only during object initialization. 调用 ，通知初始化已开始，并 通知初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 初始化后，属性更改将被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用 构造函数创建 对象将自动进行初始化，并且将忽略属性更改。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored. 对于具有不同特征的 RGB 颜色空间之间的格式转换，应使用 类。For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the class should be used. 颜色空间之间的转换需要使用源颜色配置文件和用于 gamut 映射的目标颜色配置文件来提供可靠的颜色转换。Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion. 颜色配置文件由 的 参数或 和 属性提供。The color profiles are provided by the parameters of the or by the and properties. 如果在应用转换后将图像保存到文件，则必须更新与图像数据相关的元数据标记。Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.

summary.span: 获取或设置将位图转换为可识别 Alpha 颜色的托盘化格式时，位图的 Alpha 通道阈值。

span.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.

value.span: 该 的 Alpha 通道阈值。

span.span: The alpha channel threshold for this .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值用于确定将哪一级别的不透明度映射为转换格式的完全透明颜色。The value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format. 值9.8 表示，alpha 值小于25的任何像素都将映射到透明颜色。A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color. 如果值为100，则将不完全透明的所有像素映射到透明颜色。A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color. 目标调色板应提供透明颜色;否则，透明颜色将是最接近零的颜色，通常为黑色。The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
